verses.name: Leviticus 4:14
verses.text: When the sin, which they have sinned against it, is known, then the congregation shall offer a young bullock for the sin, and bring him before the tabernacle of the congregation.

verses.name: Leviticus 4:15
verses.text: And the elders of the congregation shall lay their hands upon the head of the bullock before the Lord: and the bullock shall be killed before the Lord.

verses.name: Leviticus 4:16
verses.text: And the priest that is anointed shall bring of the bullock’s blood to the tabernacle of the congregation:
